Discover Otterlo & The Veluwe

Otterlo is the pearl of the Veluwe. Boerderij Voorste Eng is the ideal base for exploring the beautiful nature, culture, and history of Gelderland.

Highlights

National Park De Hoge Veluwe

5,400 hectares of nature park with forests, heathlands, and sand drifts, right around the corner.

Discover
Highlights

Kröller-Müller Museum

World-famous museum with the second-largest Van Gogh collection in the world.

Discover
Highlights

Jachthuis Sint Hubertus

The iconic country residence of the Kröller-Müller family, designed by Berlage.

Discover
Highlights

Museonder

The first underground museum in the world, offering a unique look into the soil.

Discover
Dining & Drinks

Restaurant De Waldhoorn

Cozy dining in a classic farmhouse atmosphere.

Discover
Dining & Drinks

Cèpes

Culinary enjoyment with local products in Hotel de Sterrenberg.

Discover
Dining & Drinks

Grand Café Kröller

Delicious lunch or dinner in the heart of Otterlo.

Discover
Dining & Drinks

Carnegie Cottage

Atmospheric restaurant with terrace.

Discover
Culture

Dutch Tile Museum

Unique collection of historical Dutch wall tiles.

Discover
Culture

Radio Kootwijk

Impressive art-deco transmitter station in the middle of the heath.

Discover
Culture

Watchtower De Valouwe

Spectacular view over the treetops of the Veluwe.

Discover
Culture

Planken Wambuis

Extensive nature reserve with wild horses and cattle.

Discover
Nature

Het Mosselsche Zand

Beautiful sand drift for endless walking.

Discover
Nature

De Zanding Sand Drift

Nature area right on the edge of Otterlo.

Discover
Nature

Adventure Path 't Eekhoorntje

Fun walking route for children through the forest.

Discover
